<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Signup"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1/internal/account/signup-if-new-user"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Sign up an organization for PAYG billing and provisioning.
Sets up Orb billing, Stigg subscription, and payment status synchronously.
Returns immediately with success or failure.

This endpoint is idempotent - if signup is already completed, returns existing subscription data
without attempting to re-provision services.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"x-organization-id","in":"header","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Select the working organization. Necessary since users can belong to multiple organizations.","title":"X-Organization-Id"},"description":"Select the working organization. Necessary since users can belong to multiple organizations."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
